data.name: Home_Hero
data.value: Modern Solutions Made By Real People

data.name: Home_Service_Integration_P
data.value: We specialize in seamlessly integrating various systems and technologies to enhance operational efficiency and collaboration.

data.name: Home_Service_Customized_P
data.value: We create tailored software solutions to meet your specific needs and help you achieve your business goals.

data.name: Home_Service_Government_P
data.value: We provide reliable technical support for government projects, enabling digital transformation and innovation in public services.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Data_SDDS_P
data.value: Whether information is in a simple flat file or is complex and gathered from multiple sources, SDDS allows any organization or business to securely receive, store, manage, then share critical content.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Emergency_CAD_P
data.value: LogiKCo’s Computer Aided Dispatch was first developed to help Police, Fire, and EMS respond to 911 calls. As a result, our CAD is built on powerful, but flexible dispatch rules with numerous prompts and user-friendly screens allowing quick dispatch action.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Edu_SMART_P
data.value: Education is critical for our children; a first step towards success in life. SMART is an education tool intended to support children of migrant workers in their endeavor to graduate from high school or earn their GED.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Records_RMS_P
data.value: RMS is a powerful and comprehensive browser-based records management system that organizes, stores, and transmits secure law enforcement and public safety information.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Auto_ASAP_P
data.value: Nothing beats great scheduling. It drives smooth operations and amps up productivity while managing costs. ASAP is LogiKCo’s solution for a web-based, automated scheduling application.

data.name: Home_Solutions_Trans_CY_P
data.value: Real-time dispatch control helps container logistics operators complete tasks efficiently.

data.name: Home_Success_P
data.value: Setting A New Standard It’s about finding a better way of doing things, pushing the envelope, and yes, setting a new standard. We’re using technology to help individuals and organizations exceed expectations. So set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: Home_Success_C_U1_P
data.value: Since implementing the real-time dispatch control system, our logistics operations have become much more efficient. With real-time updates on scheduling and cargo tracking, delays have been significantly reduced, greatly improving our overall service quality.

data.value: Since implementing the real-time dispatch control system, our logistics operations have become much more efficient. With real-time updates on scheduling and cargo tracking, delays have been significantly reduced, greatly improving our overall service quality.

data.name: Home_GotYou_P
data.value: Want an app to streamline processes, manage data, track performance, dispatch services and goods? Need a secure hosting environment? Integration challenged? We handle everything from Algorithm to Zebibyte. So dream big. Set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: About_Phil_P
data.value: At LogiKCo, we believe providing the right solutions for our customers is the number one priority. That means having a clear understanding of our customers’ needs. For every project we take on, our team of project managers, business analysts, and developers create a unique project plan package consisting of a document repositories, regular timeline updates, and numerous task management lists tracked and shared between project team members. In-person and remote training sessions as well as personal customer support are a given. Whether we’re delivering a custom solution, integrating systems, or supporting network infrastructure, our customer’s satisfaction is always our priority.

data.name: About_Tech_P
data.value: LogiKCo provides custom IT solutions. We’re here to help businesses and organizations improve and excel. Think Better. Think Faster. Think Stronger.

data.name: About_Good_P
data.value: LogiKCo’s IT team is here to help you develop a solution that works hard for your organization. But good solutions need good design and great support. Contact us today with any questions about existing or custom products. Think Innovative. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: About_From_P
data.value: LogiKCo provides IT services and support in any way that betters your organization. Think Turnkey. Think A La Carte. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: About_Employees_P
data.value: The right IT solution will give your employees powerful tools, it will provide your management with insightful reports, and it will pay off with happy customers. Think Technology. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: Skills_Process_P
data.value: It is about finding a better way of doing things, pushing the envelope, and yes, setting a new standard. We’re using technology to help individuals and organizations exceed expectations. So set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step01_P
data.value: Communicate with clients or users, gather requirements, conduct user research and needs analysis to identify core functionalities and user pain points.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step02_P
data.value: Includes UX and UI design, creating wireframes, user flows, and high-fidelity designs to ensure the best user experience and interface design.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step03_P
data.value: Define the software architecture based on requirements and design, including database design, module division, and technology selection.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step04_P
data.value: Write code based on system design and UX/UI design, turning designs into functional software features.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step05_P
data.value: Conduct comprehensive testing, including functional, performance, usability, and compatibility tests, to ensure the software meets requirements and has no major defects.

data.name: Skills_Process_Step06_P
data.value: Deploy the software to the production environment, and continuously monitor and maintain it, fix bugs, and improve features to ensure stable operation.

data.name: Skills_WhyChooseLogikco_P
data.value: Want an app to streamline processes, manage data, track performance, dispatch services and goods? Need a secure hosting environment? Integration challenged? We handle everything from Algorithm to Zebibyte. So dream big. Set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: Solutions_Projects_P
data.value: It’s about finding a better way of doing things, pushing the envelope, and yes, setting a new standard. We’re using technology to help individuals and organizations exceed expectations. So set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: ContactUs_Office_P
data.value: Whether you are interested in one of LogiKCo’s custom solutions or need technical assistance, we’re here to help in any way we can.

data.name: SDDS_H1_P
data.value: Whether information is in a simple flat file or is complex and gathered from multiple sources, SDDS allows any organization or business to securely receive, store, manage, then share critical content. SDDS is also highly customizable and has a platform which is configurable by end users with authorized role access.

data.name: SDDS_H2_P
data.value: In addition to a highly configurable platform, SDDS also allows content to be configured as needed. Critical content can be received, reformatted, then securely delivered to authorized end users.

data.name: SDDS_H3_P
data.value: SDDS can utilize various identity management systems to ensure that secure information is accessed by specified and authorized personnel only.

data.name: SDDS_H4_P
data.value: SDDS provides Secured Document Centers to enable seamless collaboration among multiple agencies or departments of an organization. Document Centers are secure, easy to manage and configurable for mandatory business requirements.

data.name: SDDS_H5_P
data.value: SDDS is currently used by Federal and State Agencies. Through services provided by SDDS, thousands of Law Enforcement Agencies are able to access, share and utilize up-to-date and critical data from fingerprint submissions and related documentation.

data.name: ASAP_H1_P
data.value: ASAP was originally designed for public safety organizations such as 911 Dispatch Centers, Police, and Fire Departments because their staff need to be available 24/7 to serve and protect their communities. Their scheduling requirements are layered and complex, often changing with evolving union rules and guidelines. Today our scheduling application is still used by public safety, but it’s also available to a range of industries. Think efficient, fair, and accurate scheduling. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: ASAP_H2_P
data.value: Crazy shifts? Varying days off? Skill requirements? Training? Overtime? Leave Management? 3rd Party Payroll that can’t keep up? We can keep going… and yup, we can handle it.

data.name: ASAP_H3_P
data.value: ASAP can be configured to cue administrators. It’s like having a personal secretary that knows everything.

data.name: ASAP_H4_P
data.value: If the rules change, then the game plan has to change. Want a flexible scheduling solution? Think ASAP. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: ASAP_H5_P
data.value: ASAP can handle endless rules for scheduling and it serves as a powerful records management for scheduling data. But end users only see organized and user-friendly screens. Data is served up in a variety of ways depending on user role privileges.

data.name: CAD_H2
data.value: Call Taker, Dispatch, and Reference screens

data.name: CAD_H1_P
data.value: LogiKCo’s Computer Aided Dispatch was first developed to help Police, Fire, and EMS respond to 911 calls. As a result, our CAD is built on powerful, but flexible dispatch rules with numerous prompts and user-friendly screens allowing quick dispatch action. Need to dispatch for public safety, car service, moving, trucking, and more? Think Fast. Think Accurate. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: CAD_H2_P
data.value: The most important receiver of data is the Dispatcher. Our CAD provides dispatchers comprehensive data via interfaces with Call Handling, GIS, AVL, MDT, RMS, and more.

data.name: CAD_H3_P
data.value: LogiKCo’s CAD recommends the right resource based on configured rules, response plans, and geographic availability.

data.name: CAD_H4_P
data.value: Configurable Situational and Event-Waiting Notifications along with Multi-view and Real-time Maps give Dispatchers the critical tools needed to get the job done quickly and accurately.

data.name: CAD_H5_P
data.value: LogiKCo’s CAD manages data so that Dispatching is easy and logical. The right resources get to the right location in a timely manner. Need to dispatch for public safety, car service, moving, trucking, and more? Think LogiKCo.

data.name: RMS_H1_P
data.value: Our RMS was developed in collaboration with and for law enforcement. As a result, it’s foundation is built on efficient master indices for People, Vehicles, Locations, Property, and Organizations. Accessible from multiple mobile devices, our RMS includes comprehensive querying and reporting functionality. It was designed to integrate with crucial third party applications such as Computer Aided Dispatch as well as Person and Vehicle Verification Systems. Narrative template capability, workflow management, and data sharing make this system an effective tool; allowing law enforcement to serve and protect their communities.

data.name: RMS_H2_P
data.value: Actually, it’s Incident Reporting, Case Management, Arrest & Booking, Bulk Arrests, Property & Evidence Management, Warrants, Field Interviews…

data.name: RMS_H3_P
data.value: An RMS isn’t an RMS without extensive reports to present the facts and figures. Access, investigate, and connect a deep inventory of information with numerous queries.

data.name: RMS_H4_P
data.value: LogiKCo understands that data collected for law enforcement must often go through strict protocol and workflow management. So yes, we have that functionality built in!

data.name: RMS_H5_P
data.value: Law Enforcement personnel are often in the field. All that data is no use if they can’t access it on their mobile devices and Mobile Device Terminals. Think Ahead. Think LogiKCo.

data.name: CY_H1_P
data.value: Real-time dispatch control helps container logistics operators complete tasks efficiently. In the competitive logistics industry, time is money, and any delays can lead to extra costs and reduced efficiency. With a real-time dispatch control system, operators can accurately allocate each transport task, ensuring tasks such as container loading and transportation are completed on time. The system's automated task assignment adjusts dynamically based on real-time conditions, optimizing the use of vehicles and human resources to ensure smooth and punctual operations. This reduces transportation time, minimizes waiting, and cuts unnecessary resource waste, ultimately offering more competitive services and increasing profit margins for the business.

data.name: SampleText
data.value: It’s about finding a better way of doing things, pushing the envelope, and yes, setting a new standard. We’re using technology to help individuals and organizations exceed expectations. So set your bar high. Think LogiKCo.
